name: Rage Game: The Game
description:
GET READY TO RAGE!

This game was made with one purpose in mind. MAKE. PEOPLE. RAGE! So yeah, uh, try not to break your computer ok?

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE!!!

Please don't complain that there are not a lot of levels. There coming! You just have to wait for me to make them! Game development is harder than you think, and I don't want to rush anything and end up making a terrible game. So please, have patience :)

OK THAT'S IT FOR THE DESCRIPTION HAVE FUN!!!!
